p: All assays were carried out in triplicate. The results are expressed as mean values ± standard deviation (SD). The activities of extracts were differentiated through one-way analysis of variance (ANOVA), followed by Tukey’s honestly significant difference post hoc test with α = 0.05. The analysis was carried out using SPSS v. 14.0. Principal component analysis (PCA) using XLSTAT was applied to the resultant variables from the phytochemical analysis and biological assays.
